description: This file defines a Python class 'FastApi' that extends 'AwsApp' and configures deployment parameters for a FastAPI application, including container environment variables and server settings.

classes.name: FastApi
classes.description: A class representing configuration for deploying a FastAPI application on AWS, including container, image, port, and Uvicorn settings.

methods.name: get_container_env
methods.description: Generates environment variables for the container based on class attributes and inherited environment variables.
